alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Brown; Eastern Cherry; Holt; Keya Paha; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Excessive Heat Watch issued June 16 at 2:17PM CDT until June 20 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Dangerously hot conditions with heat index values over 100 possible. * WHERE...Eastern Cherry, Keya Paha, Boyd, Brown, Rock and Holt Counties. * WHEN...From Saturday morning through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Extreme heat and humidity will significantly increase the potential for heat related illnesses, particularly for those working or participating in outdoor activities. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Persistent near record temperatures will lead to dangerous heat index values each day Saturday through Monday. Additionally, overnight lows will only fall into the 70s, limiting heat relief.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Be prepared to drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air- conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances. This is especially true during warm or hot weather when car interiors can reach lethal temperatures in a matter of minutes.

area.areaDesc: Boyd; Brown; Eastern Cherry; Holt; Keya Paha; Rock
